steps.title: Tell him how you feel with a beautiful love note that touches his heart.
steps.content: Tell him how you feel with a beautiful love note that touches his heart. When texting him about your feelings, the most important thing is to be honest and open, even though they might not be ready to say â€œI love youâ€ back. Marriage and family therapist Moshe Ratson says, â€œIn an ideal situation, express your love sincerely and without expectation. To be in such a position, you have to have the self-confidence that allows you to provide such unconditional love.â€ Use one of these confession texts for inspiration: â€œYouâ€™re my whole worldğŸŒ, handsome, and I love you so much.â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â€ â€œI love you because youâ€™re brilliant, intelligent, and wiseâ€”just talking to you makes so happy.â€ â€œYouâ€™re the man I want to be with until the end of the world. steps.title: Share your love with your sweetie with an adorable text.
steps.content: Share your love with your sweetie with an adorable text. We all know itâ€™s okay to get a little sappy from time to time, right? When you confess your love to someone , tell them how you feel with an adorable text that makes them feel loved. And remember to add a few super-cute emojis! Try one of these to get started: â€œYou + me = meant to be.â€ â€œI could stare into those gorgeous eyes of yours forever. I love you.â€ â€œEvery time I hug you, I never want to let you go! I love you soâ€¦darnedâ€¦much.â€ â€œQuick thing: Do you know how much I love you?â€ â€œI smile every time I think of you. I love you!â€ â€œI feel safest and happiest when Iâ€™m in your arms. Thatâ€™s how I know this is love.â€ â€œAre you secretly Liam Neeson? Iâ€™m taken by you.â€ â€œI love you because youâ€™re my favorite distraction.â€ â€œI hope you know CPRâ€”because you take my breath away. I am so in love with you.ğŸ˜®â€ğŸ’¨ğŸ˜â€ â€œI love you and I wish your arms were wrapped around me.â€ â€œNobodyâ€™s perfect, but you come pretty darn close. I love you.â€ â€œThe perfect crime: You stole my heart. I love you.ğŸ‘®ğŸ˜‰ğŸ’â€ â€œYouâ€™re the hottest and smartest person in the world, and youâ€™re all mine! I love you!â€ â€œWhen Iâ€™m having a bad day, all you have to do is show up and everything gets brighter. I think itâ€™s because you have my heart.â€ â€œMy friends are jealous of how perfect you are! Just another reason for me to love you.â€ â€œI love you. Iâ€™m proud of you and proud to be yours!â€ â€œWith you, I finally understand what all those sappy love songs are about. I love you.ğŸ¶â¤ï¸â€ â€œNo oneâ€™s perfect â€¦ except you! I love you!â€ â€œIâ€™m a little bit obsessed with you! I canâ€™t help it. I love you.â€ â€œYouâ€™re too good to be true! You make my life a dream! And I donâ€™t want to wake up because I love you that much .â€ â€œYou and I are the same kind of strange, and I love that about us because I love you.â€ â€œI love you! Youâ€™re also my Friday night treat.ğŸ§â€ â€œEveryone has their own motivation to get up in the morning, and seeing you is mine. steps.title: Make them laugh with a humorous love note to confess your feelings.
steps.content: Make them laugh with a humorous love note to confess your feelings. Sometimes, expressing your feelings is easier when you add a dose of humor. Plus, humor just plain makes people feel good! These messages are a great place to start: â€œIâ€™ve fallen for youâ€¦and I canâ€™t get up. Thatâ€™s how I know itâ€™s true love.â€ â€œYou're just like bacon. You make everything better. And I love you almost as much.â€ â€œI gotta chill and itâ€™s gotta be with youâ€¦coz I love you!â€ â€œMy heart is full of emotional emojis right now. Especially,ğŸ‘ï¸â¤ï¸U!â€ â€œYouâ€™ve got me eyeing you like fine print. I love you!" â€œYou're holding the remote control to my heart.â€ â€œIâ€™d like you to guest star on my Love Boat.â€ â€œIâ€™m your #1 fan! Always and forever. Cheesy but trueâ€¦and I love you! Look at that! I love you so much, I rhymed!â€ â€œI love you, so I plan on bugging you for a long, long time.â€ â€œI love you best, so you always have dibs on my free time.â€ â€œYou've stolen a pizza my heart.â€ â€œI love you! Letâ€™s grow old and wrinkly together!â€ â€œIâ€™m thirsty and youâ€™re the tall glass of water I need. And thatâ€™s why I love you.â€ â€œIf love is a mental disorder, then I must be out of my mind because I'm so in love with you.â€ â€œIf loving you was a sport, I'd have a gold medal and the world record.â€ â€œI love you so much I'm stuck on you like super glue.â€ â€œI love you more than coffee on a Monday morning.â€ â€œIâ€™m crazy for you, or maybe just crazyâ€¦but I still love you!â€ â€œI love you more than zombies love brains.â€

steps.title: Let a famous love quote speak for you.
steps.content: Let a famous love quote speak for you. Finding the right words can be hard. The good news is that there are some great lines from famous people, books, and movies that are already out there for you to use to help you tell them whatâ€™s in your heart. Try one of these swoon-worthy quotes for a romantic start: â€œI love youâ€”I am at rest with youâ€”I have come home.â€ â€“ Dorothy L. Sayers â€œI love you as certain dark things are loved, secretly, between the shadow and the soul.â€ â€“ Pablo Neruda â€œMy heart is and always will be yours." â€“ Jane Austen â€œIt wasnâ€™t love at first sight. It took a full five minutes.â€ â€“ Lucille Ball â€œi carry your heart with me (i carry it in my heart).â€ â€“ e.e. cummings â€œWho, being loved, is poor?â€ â€“ Oscar Wilde â€œI do love nothing in the world so well as you.â€ â€“ William Shakespeare â€œYou are my heart, my life, my one and only thought.â€ â€“ Sir Arthur Conan Doyle â€œIn all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.â€ â€“ Maya Angelou â€œI love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.â€ â€“ Paulo Coelho â€œI love thee to the depth and breadth and height my soul can reach.â€ â€“ Elizabeth Barrett Browning â€œDo I love you? My god, if your love were a grain of sand, mine would be a universe of beaches." â€“ William Goldman â€œI have found the one whom my soul loves.â€ â€“ Song of Solomon 3:4 â€œWhatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.â€ â€“ Emily BrontÃ« â€œI love her, and thatâ€™s the beginning and end of everything.â€ â€“ F. Scott Fitzgerald â€œMy bounty is as boundless as the sea, my love as deep; the more I give to thee, the more I have, for both are infinite.â€ â€“ William Shakespeare â€œI love you, not only for what you are but for what I am when I am with you." â€“ Roy Croft â€œI would rather spend one lifetime with you, than face all the ages of this world alone.â€ â€“ J.R.R. Tolkien â€œI have a strange feeling with regard to you. As if I had a string somewhere under my left ribs, tightly knotted to a similar string in you. And if you were to leave I'm afraid that cord of communion would snap. And I have a notion that I'd take to bleeding inwardly.â€ â€“ Charlotte BrontÃ« â€œI love you. You annoy me more than I ever thought possible. But I want to spend every irritating minute with you.â€ â€“ Iona Mink â€œIn case you ever foolishly forget: I am never not thinking of you.â€ â€“ Virginia Woolf â€œI love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you. I love you not only for what you have made of yourself, but for what you are making of me. I love you for the part of me that you bring out.â€ â€“ Elizabeth Barrett Browning â€œIâ€™ve tried so many times to think of a new way to say it, and itâ€™s still I love you.â€ â€“ Zelda Fitzgerald â€œIn vain have I struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be repressed. You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you." â€“ Jane Austen â€œI love you no matter what you do, but do you have to do so much of it?â€ â€“ Jean Illsley Clarke â€œEvery day I discover that I love you even more, and in this infinite universe I will love you till the world ends.â€ â€“ Alicia N. Green â€œIf I know what love is, it is because of you.â€ â€“ Hermann Hesse â€œEach day I love you more, today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.â€ â€“ Rosemonde GÃ©rard â€œI saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect, and I loved you even more.â€ â€“ Angelita Lim

steps.title: Share romantic lyrics that say what you feel for them.
steps.content: Share romantic lyrics that say what you feel for them. Songwriters are the masters of finding powerful ways to confess their love. Does the one you love have a favorite romantic song? Thatâ€™s a great place to start when choosing a lyric that expresses your feelings and speaks to them. If you arenâ€™t sure what songs are their favorites, try one of these lyrics from love songs: â€œMy love is the evenin' breeze touchin' your skin, the gentle, sweet singin' of leaves in the wind.â€ â€“ Heart, â€œCrazy on Youâ€ â€œYou'll be the only one. 'Cause no one can deny this love I have inside.â€ â€“ Diana Ross & Lionel Richie â€œThe wonder of it all is that you just don't realize how much I love you." â€“ Eric Clapton, â€œWonderful Tonightâ€ â€œWise men say only fools rush in, but I canâ€™t help falling in love with you.â€ â€“ Elvis Presley, â€œCanâ€™t Help Falling in Loveâ€ â€œAll the promises we make from the cradle to the grave when all I want is you.â€ U2, â€œAll I Want Is Youâ€ â€œ Nothing that I wouldnâ€™t do, go to the ends of the Earth for you to make you feel my love.â€ â€“ Adele, â€œTo Make You Feel My Loveâ€ â€œBaby, I'm amazed at the way you love me all the time. And maybe I'm afraid of the way I love you.â€ â€“ Paul McCartney, â€œMaybe Iâ€™m Amazedâ€ â€œI don't care if Monday's blue. Tuesday's grey and Wednesday, too. Thursday, I don't care about you. It's Friday, I'm in love.â€ â€“ The Cure, â€œFriday Iâ€™m in Loveâ€ â€œCome with me, my love, to the sea, the sea of love. I want to tell you just how much I love you." â€“ Phil Philips, â€œSea of Loveâ€ â€œWait, they don't love you like I love you.â€ â€“ Yeah Yeah Yeahs, â€œMapsâ€ â€œDon't get me wrong, if I'm looking kind of dazzled. I see neon lights whenever you walk by.â€ â€“ The Pretenders, â€œDonâ€™t Get Me Wrongâ€ â€œI couldn't love you any better. I love you just the way you are.â€ â€“ Billy Joel, â€œJust the Way You Areâ€ â€œI hope you donâ€™t mind that I put down in words how wonderful life is while youâ€™re in the world.â€ â€“ Elton John, â€œYour Songâ€ â€œBaby, don't make me spell it out for you, all of the feelings that I've got for you.â€ Janelle MonÃ¡e, â€œMake Me Feelâ€ â€œOh, honey, I'd walk through fire for you. Just let me adore you like it's the only thing I'll ever do.â€ â€“ Harry Styles, â€œAdore Youâ€ â€œMy love must be a kind of blind love. I canâ€™t see anything but you.â€ â€“ The Flamingos, â€œI Only Have Eyes for Youâ€ â€œYou fill up my senses. Come fill me again." â€“ John Denver, â€œAnnieâ€™s Songâ€ â€œMany, many, many nights go by. I sit at home alone, and I cry over you. What can I do? I canâ€™t help myself when, baby, itâ€™s you.â€ â€“ The Shirelles, â€œBaby Itâ€™s Youâ€ â€œOh, you're in my blood like holy wine. You taste so bitter and so sweet. Oh, I could drink a case of you, darling, and still I'd be on my feet.â€ Joni Mitchell, â€œA Case of Youâ€ â€œAnd here we are in Heaven for you are mine at last.â€ â€“ Etta James, â€œAt Lastâ€ â€œI tell myself I don't care that much. But I feel like I die 'till I feel your touch. Only love, only love can hurt like this.â€ â€“ Paloma Faith, â€œOnly Love Can Hurt Like Thisâ€ â€œIf the sun refused to shine, I would still be loving you.â€ â€“ Led Zeppelin, â€œThank Youâ€ â€œI'm gonna love you like I've never been hurt before. I'm gonna love you like I'm indestructible.â€ Robyn, â€œIndestructibleâ€ â€œDonâ€™t ask me what you know is true. Donâ€™t have to tell you I love your precious heart.â€ â€“ INXS, â€œNever Tear Us Apartâ€ â€œI may not always love you, but as long as there are stars above you, you never need to doubt it. Iâ€™ll make you so sure about it.â€ â€“ The Beach Boys, â€œGod Only Knowsâ€ â€œOo, baby, here I am, signed, sealed, delivered, I'm yours!â€ - Stevie Wonder, â€œSigned, Sealed, Delivered (Iâ€™m Yours)â€ â€œI'll follow you into the park, through the jungle, through the dark. Girl, I never loved one like you.â€ â€“ Edward Sharpe & the Magnetic Zeros, â€œHomeâ€ â€œBefore the day I met you, life was so unkind. But you're the key to my peace of mind.â€ â€“ Aretha Franklin, â€œ(You Make Me Feel Like) a Natural Woman â€œFor I love, love you so. Promise Iâ€™ll never let you go in the still of the night.â€ â€“ The Five Satins, â€œIn the Still of the Nightâ€

steps.title: Keep your confession short and sweet to get right to the point.
steps.content: Keep your confession short and sweet to get right to the point. You donâ€™t need to write a long, flowery love letter if thatâ€™s not your style. Sometimes, a short message is the best way to say what you want in the most direct way. Remember, when you only use a few words, each one counts, so only choose ones that express your genuine feelings. Here are a few options and ideas to help you find the right words: â€œLife is more beautiful with you in it. I love you.â€ â€œJust wanted to remind you that Iâ€™m yours and always will be. I love you.â€ â€œWhen I picture my future, youâ€™re right there with me. I love you!â€ â€œMy favorite place in the world is wherever you are. I love you.â€ â€œMy love for you has no boundaries.â€ â€œYou make me feel a kind of love I didnâ€™t know truly existed. Thank you.â€ â€œI just wanted to say I love you.â€ â€œWith you, I feel more excited by the possibilities in front of us than ever before. I love you.â€ â€œI love you. Thank you for being you.â€ â€œYouâ€™re the most beautiful person Iâ€™ve ever met. I love you.â€ â€œI donâ€™t need paradise because I found something better: My love for you.â€ â€œI love you so much. Meeting you has been my greatest blessing.â€ â€œYou mean everything to me, and I love you so much.â€ â€œYouâ€™re more valuable to me than priceless gems. I love you.â€ â€œNever forget: I love you exactly the way you are. Youâ€™re amazing!â€ â€œA day with you is heaven itself because I love you so much.â€ â€œI love you. Every time you smile at me, the rest of the world disappears.â€ â€œI love everything about you, from your wonderful mind to your kind heart.â€ â€œMy love for you has no limits, and itâ€™s always growing.â€ â€œI love you, so Iâ€™ll always choose youâ€”every single day.â€ â€œYou are my soulmate. I love everything about you.â€ â€œI donâ€™t ever want this to end because I love you.â€ â€œIâ€™ve never felt so close to another person before. I love you.â€ â€œI love you always.â€ â€œEvery day with you is a fairy tale. I love you.â€ â€œThereâ€™s nothing and no one I love more than you.â€ â€œMy love for you lights up my life.â€ â€œI love you. You are the center of my world.â€ â€œWith you, I finally know what true love is.â€

steps.title: Send a long note to show them how important they are to you.
steps.content: Send a long note to show them how important they are to you. Sometimes, you need more space to really get to the heart of what youâ€™re feeling. Psychotherapist Kelli Miller says, â€œYou are complimenting them as a person, but you're also showing them that, â€˜Hey, there are possibilities here. We do have the same interests. Things could work. I do believe we are compatible.â€™â€ So, write a message as long as you like to get that across. Use one of these longer love confession messages for inspiration: â€œYour presence is a constant reminder that true love exists, and I'm fortunate to have found it in you. I'm grateful for the way you make me feel special, the way you make me laugh until my sides hurt, and the way you make every day an adventure. You are my forever, and I love you more than words can describe.â€ â€œFrom the moment our eyes met, I knew my life would never be the same. You swept into my world like a gentle breeze, bringing with you love, laughter, and a sense of belonging I never knew I craved. I love you with every part of my soul.â€ â€œI wanted to take a moment to tell you just how much you mean to me. You are the light of my life, the one who makes everything better, and I am so grateful to have you in my heart. I love you more with each passing day.â€ â€œOur souls became one when our eyes met each other. Seeing you makes me feel everything is fine. You are my best friend, my soulmate, and my lover. You mean the world to me, and I will always love you! â€œBefore you, I thought love was a concept reserved for storybooks and movies. But you've shown me that true love exists, and it's more beautiful and real than anything I could have imagined.â€ â€œWhen life gets tough, you are my ray of sunshine, my beacon of hope. Your ability to lift my spirits with just a few words or a simple gesture never ceases to amaze me. Thank you for being the incredible person you are. I love you.â€ â€œOur love story is my favorite. It's filled with laughter, joy, and endless love. From the first time we met, I knew there was something extraordinary about you. As our relationship has grown, so has my love for you. I can't wait to see where our story takes us next.â€ â€œThe love in my heart only continues to expand, knowing that you are here beside me throughout our journey. Each passing day strengthens our bond as I remain thankful for all the moments shared between usâ€”moments that continually show how much you mean to me.â€ â€œDid you know that you're the reason I believe in fairytales? With your arrival in my life, you've turned my ordinary existence into an extraordinary love story. You have woven magic into every fiber of my being, and I'm forever grateful for the way you make me feel alive. Thank you for lighting my soul up. I love you.â€ â€œYou are the most incredible person I've ever known. From the way you make strangers smile to the way you care for those in need, your heart shines brighter than a thousand suns. Being with you has taught me the true meaning of love and has opened my eyes to the beauty in this world.â€

steps.title: Write a deep love letter to share everything youâ€™re feeling.
steps.content: Write a deep love letter to share everything youâ€™re feeling. Ratson says that deep and true love needs time to develop. But if you feel you want to say, â€œI love you,â€ after spending a short time together, go for it. So, donâ€™t hold back if you want to write out the depth of your feelings. Check out these deep love letters can help you get started: Dearest Love, I never knew how bright and beautiful life could be until I met you. Every time I see you, my heart leaps in my chest and my breath catches in my throat. Iâ€™ve never had this feeling for anyone else. When I think about the deep conversations we have, it makes me feel warm and cozy, like thatâ€™s what home is. It feels like we can talk about any subject, and Iâ€™ll always learn something new or see something in a different light. Every time I think of youâ€”especially the way you look when you laughâ€”I canâ€™t help but smile. You light up my life even when we arenâ€™t together. Sometimes Iâ€™m so joyful, I feel like my heart will burst out of my chest with all the excitement I feel when I think about seeing you again. I love you with all my heart. My One & Only Love, My heart flutters everytime you walk into the room. In my eyes, you grow more amazing, intelligent, and beautiful each time I see you. Every word you confide in me melts my heart because it means you let yourself be vulnerable with me. Iâ€™m so unbelievably honored at the way you trust me with every part of your life. I never imagined Iâ€™d find someone who I could be happy to spend so much time with. I look forward to spending many, many more moments with you, whether something special happens or weâ€™re just chilling together. When I see you, I see my future. These words come from my heart. Iâ€™m consumed by an overwhelming desire to be with you. I think you could be my everything, and I know I want to be everything to you. I love you truly, madly, deeply, and forever.

steps.title: Decide how and when you want to tell them how you feel.
steps.content: Decide how and when you want to tell them how you feel. Ratson says, â€œThere is no precise formula for when to say "I love you." You should say it whenever you feel that way, without making too many calculations about timing.â€ So when you feel like youâ€™re ready to tell someone you love them, you have a few decisions to make. Will you tell them face to face, give them a letter, or send them a message? If you tell them in person, is there a special place you want to go? Itâ€™s really up to you and what you think will make the best impression on your sweetie. No matter how you choose to confess your love, try to shoot for a time and place when you can be alone. Even if the person is overjoyed, they might want to have a little one-on-one time. The reality is that they may not feel the way you doâ€¦or they might not be ready to tell you they love you. A private moment gives you both space to process and express your feelings.

steps.title: Figure out what you want to say.
steps.content: Figure out what you want to say. More than just telling them you love them, try to expand on that with reasons why you love them. Miller suggests saying something like, â€œI'm feeling very strongly.â€ And maybe you could state the reasons why, like, â€œI think that we have the same interests, there are a lot of things that I like about you that I also like about myself.â€ When in doubt, just say what youâ€™re feeling and make sure you let them know how special they are. Miller adds, â€œI would be very honest and say, hey, I see some amazing qualities in you. I think that there could be potential here.â€

steps.title: Look into their eyes and just say whatâ€™s in your heart.
steps.content: Look into their eyes and just say whatâ€™s in your heart. When the moment comes, gaze into their eyes to show youâ€™re sincere about what youâ€™re about to say. Then, just say it. Ratson suggests, â€œFeel the moment. Be in the present and add that you know that it might be premature to say it, but you see you see great potential for the relationship to grow.â€ When youâ€™re ready to confess your love, leave it at a simple â€œI love youâ€ or wax poetic about all the ways you love them. Itâ€™s really up to you. Try talking about how you knew you were in love with them. Just be honest, genuine, and sincere and you canâ€™t go wrong.

steps.title: React in a respectful way that shows you care about them.
steps.content: React in a respectful way that shows you care about them. If your sweetie says, â€œI love you,â€ backâ€¦awesome! Throw your arms around them and give them a sweet and passionate kiss. However, your love may need a minute. Miller says to just being patient. Sometimes, they donâ€™t say â€œI love youâ€ back immediately.â€ She adds, â€œIt's worth a try of asking, being courageous, and saying, â€˜Hey, do you want to give this a go?â€™â€ Gopman says, â€œFirst of all, it's okay to tell somebody how you feel. In society, we're always scared to tell people how weâ€™re feeling because we're scared to get hurt, but the way to truly fall in love and to be in love is to be vulnerable, and to be open to that.â€

steps.title: Check out famous love confession scenes from movies for inspiration.
steps.content: Check out famous love confession scenes from movies for inspiration. Still not sure how to go about confessing your love for that special someone? Then, itâ€™s time to turn to Hollywood! Watch a few of these famous love confession scenes to see if they spark any ideas: Notting Hill â€“ â€œIâ€™m just a girlâ€¦â€ Jerry Maguire â€“ â€œYou complete meâ€¦â€ Pride & Prejudice (2005) â€“ â€œYou have bewitched meâ€¦â€ The Empire Strikes Back â€“ â€œI love youâ€¦â€
